description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Remote Code Execution vulnerability associated with CVE-2024-21357 affecting Windows systems, apply the relevant KB updates listed below:

1. For Windows 11 Version 23H2 (x64-based Systems), download and apply update from:
   [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)  
2. For Windows 11 Version 22H2 (x64-based Systems), download and apply update from:
   [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)  
3. For Windows 11 Version 21H2 (x64-based Systems), download and apply update from:
   [KB5034766](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766)  
4. For Windows 10 (x64-based Systems), download and apply update from:
   [KB5034774](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034774)  
5. For Windows 10 (32-bit Systems), download and apply update from:
   [KB5034774](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034774)  
6. For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (x64-based Systems), download and apply update from:
   [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)  
7. For Windows 10 Version 21H2 (x64-based Systems), download and apply update from:
   [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)  

**Details**:
This vulnerability can lead to Remote Code Execution through Windows PGM. Ensure that the updates are applied to the respective Windows versions to mitigate the risks. Backup data before proceeding with the updates.
